full_summary:
================{}

### Title
{T3033-2324R8-2 - Purchase of a Four-Wheel Drive Snowplow Vehicle - Sept-Îles Airport}

### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a four-wheel drive cab-over-engine snow plow vehicle, including delivery and training, at the Sept-Îles Airport, Quebec, Canada.

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3675929744-Doc3752731119
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3675929744
* **Publication Date**: November 16, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 30, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 23, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 31, 2024

### Solicitation Type

* **Solicitation Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Business opportunities are open to companies from several countries, including Canada, Chile, Colombia, Peru, the United Kingdom, Honduras, the European Union, Panama, the United States, Ukraine, and Korea, under various trade agreements.

### Contract Details

* **Classification**: UN 25101926 Snow plow truck
* **Regions of Delivery**: Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contact Information
For more information or to access the solicitation document, please visit the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14652439?extsite=MTQ2NTI0MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14652439?extsite=MTQ2NTI0MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Questions
Questions regarding this solicitation may be submitted in writing to Sonia Langis, Director, Business Development. [sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important
Please note that all supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on the closing date.
